flashcards.title: DMV California Practice Flashcards - Set 1
flashcards.description: 15 essential DMV questions and answers for California driving test preparation

cards.question: It is illegal for a person 21 years of age or older to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) that is ____ or higher.
You must notify DMV within 5 days if you:
You are getting ready to make a right turn. You should:
cards.answer: signal during the last 100 feet before you turn

cards.question: For which of the following traffic lights must you always stop your vehicle?
cards.answer: solid red lights, flashing red lights, and blacked-out traffic signals

cards.question: When is it legal to use a cell phone without a hands-free device while driving?
cards.answer: when making a call for emergency assistance

cards.question: When a traffic signal light isn't working at an intersection, you should:
cards.answer: come to a complete stop then proceed when it is safe

cards.question: You should adjust your rear view and side view mirrors:
Smoking inside a vehicle when a person younger than 18 years of age is present is:
You must make a written report of traffic accident occurring in California (SR 1) to DMV if you:
cards.answer: are involved in a collision and there is more than $750 in damages

cards.question: It is a good habit to signal continuously during the last 100 feet before you turn at an intersection:
cards.answer: even if you do not see any other vehicles around

cards.question: When sharing the road with a light rail vehicle:
cards.answer: never turn in front of an approaching light rail vehicle

cards.question: You are driving at night on a dimly lit street and using high beams. You should dim your lights when you are within 500 feet of:
cards.answer: a vehicle approaching you from behind

cards.question: Allow extra space in front of your vehicle when following a:
Even if you know your vehicle can maneuver a sharp curve at the legal speed limit, you should still slow down because:
cards.answer: there may be a stalled car or collision ahead that you can't see

cards.question: You park your car at the curb on a level two-way street. Before getting out of your car, you should:
cards.answer: look for cars or bicycles on the traffic side of your vehicle
